data.text:
@supertanskiii The Grauniad is now owned by a hedge fund.
There is no left wing representation in the mass media, just us.
@supertanskiii @F__CKTHETORIES The War waged by the Tory Party on its people for the past 10+ years
@supertanskiii Britain can avoid them, but its not suitable to the narrative. How come gas exports from north sea have gone up 90%? Why not reduce the burden on UK citizens? Money 💰
@supertanskiii @WantToriesOut The Tories have been horribly lucky since Brexit: a pandemic and now a war to hide their corruption & incompetence behind.

@supertanskiii It’s beyond a joke, last time I filled my oil tank it was 41p a litre, I have a 1000 ltr tank, and when I called to place an order  it’s now 90p per litre! So we (the great unwashed) suffer while Worzel fucking Gummidge get a £2k pay rise!! WTF 

Someone needs to assassinate him!

@supertanskiii @emmacarps Sorry NO they already said  prices would go up before this War started and blamed Umm Covid which they now appear to have forgotten.
Or was it the EU ?.
So many excuses its hard to keep up.
We all know the real reason was BREXIT and Tory GREED
@jackjacktayler Where will the other 50% come from?
@VanDutchmanXXX What has that to do with nationalising it?
